Thanks, I've been so busy lately, if any of you like my work so far also check out my latest mining mod beta 1.2 http://www./?yt27yndy7fcn9yx

The 10m truss is included in this mod, this was just a showcase and a bug testing report place, I'd love to see all the things you've built with this really long truss I made.

And yes Maverick Sawyer, very DR truss inspired, I have been working closely with r4m0n and he's a really nice guy and very helpful. I decided to make my truss as familliar and as compatible with existing parts as possible.

Any bugs PLEASE message me, I am DYING to hear your reports.
